line_1: My footsteps to the dreary verge,
line_2: Few days, few years, perhaps few moments urge

line_1: Into the pearly mist of ocean's verge.
line_2: And interlacing slopes that gently merge

line_1: Fades in the west, sees, from the rocky verge,
line_2: And hears with ear appall'd, th' impetuous surge
